Filesystem


Functions

VFS_STATUS RegisterNode (RMISERIAL rmiSerial, LUString nodePath, LUString ident)

VFS_STATUS CreateVirtualLink (LUString nodePath, LUString linkedPath)

Detailed Description

Functions usefull for filesystems to register a node in the VFS tree

Function Documentation

VFS_STATUS CreateVirtualLink ( LUString  nodePath,
LUString  linkedPath 
)

Creates a link that does NOT need file system support. Only works with nodes, not with files! That way, the fs can be accessed on multiple paths

Parameters:
nodePath already existing node
linkedPath virtual node to create
Returns:
Error or success (node doesn't exist, not enough rights, etc.)

VFS_NODE_INFO GetNodeInfo ( LUString  nodePath  ) 

VFS_STATUS RegisterNode ( RMISERIAL  rmiSerial,
LUString  nodePath,
LUString  ident 
)

Register a node in VFS. This node can later provide access to files in different file systems

Parameters:
rmiSerial The serial of the sender
nodePath the pathe to create node at
ident Just addional information for human beings ;)
Returns:
Error or success. Depends on rights and if path is already in use

LUString  nodePath
